title: Add 67 Clicker game based on the Six Seven meme

requirements.text: Build an in-browser '67 Clicker' game using React and canvas, themed around the 'six seven' meme. The player clicks (or taps) a large central character/image representing the 'six seven' meme to score points. Each click produces a '67!' hit effect with a visual flash/shake animation and a score increment. Include a combo multiplier that increases when the player clicks rapidly (within a short time window) and resets after a pause. Display the current score prominently and a best score (persisted in localStorage). Show a pulsing idle animation on the character when not being clicked. Style the game with the dark neon arcade theme consistent with the rest of the platform, using neon glow effects and bold Orbitron typography.

quotes: Make a 67 clicker with six seven meme

acceptanceCriteria: A canvas-based clicker game component (SixSevenGame.tsx) is created in frontend/src/components/games/
A large clickable '67' / six-seven meme character is rendered in the center of the canvas
Each click increments the score and triggers a '67!' floating text effect with a flash/shake animation
A combo multiplier increases score when clicks occur within a short time window and resets after ~1 second of inactivity
Current score and best score are both displayed prominently; best score persists in localStorage
The character shows a pulsing idle animation when not being clicked
The game uses the platform's dark neon arcade theme: near-black background, neon accent colors, Orbitron typography, neon glow effects

requirements.text: Register the 67 Clicker game in the game routing map in frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx so that navigating to its game page by its seeded title slug (e.g., '67-clicker') renders the SixSevenGame component and increments the play count on mount.

quotes: Make a 67 clicker with six seven meme

acceptanceCriteria: GamePage.tsx includes an entry in its game routing map that maps the slug for '67 Clicker' to the SixSevenGame component
Navigating to /game/67-clicker (or equivalent slug) renders the SixSevenGame component
The play count is incremented via the backend on mount

requirements.text: Add the 67 Clicker game to the seed games list in frontend/src/lib/seedGames.ts with title '67 Clicker', a short description referencing the six seven meme, category 'Clicker', and a thumbnail filename (e.g., '67-clicker.png'), so it appears in the game library on the homepage.

quotes: Make a 67 clicker with six seven meme

acceptanceCriteria: seedGames.ts includes an entry for '67 Clicker' with title, description, category 'Clicker', and thumbnail filename
The 67 Clicker game card appears in the game library on the homepage after seeding
The seed function correctly adds the game to the backend if it is missing

constraints: Follow the existing dark neon arcade visual theme (near-black background, neon accent colors, Orbitron/Rajdhani fonts, neon glow effects)
Best score must be persisted in localStorage, not the backend
Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths
nonGoals: Any changes to existing game components

required: Neon-styled '67' number illustration with a meme-inspired bold comedic face, dark background with electric yellow and hot-pink neon glow accents (67-clicker.dim_256x256.png)
